item.title: NCAA MB Categorical Analysis
item.description: Below is an updating categorical analysis report on American college basketball recruits heading to the 2019 NBA Draft. The report matches 2018-2019 NCAAMB statistics from sports-reference to Aran Smith’s 2019 Big Board: Top 100 Prospects. The report methodology is based on Ed Weiland’s analysis, which I took and retooled just a bit. Here, I first wrote using the analysis at Nylon Calculus for the 2018 NBA Draft class.
